params.inFlightTxInclusionProof: Inclusion proof for the in-flight tx
params.inFlightTxPos: The UTXO position of the in-flight exit. Should hardcode 0 for the outputIndex.

buildController(PlasmaFramework,Spending.notice: Function that builds the controller struct
